t:property.name: appointment.content
t:property.value: Content of the Resource Modify message${TIME}.${COUNTER}

t:test_case.t:objective: basic system check
Create a resource with type= Equipment and modify with type= Location
Create a resource with type= Equipment and modify with type= blank/space/sometext/spchar/negative/zero values
Create a resource with type= Location and modify with type= Equipment
Create a resource with type= location and modify with type= blank/space/sometext/spchar/negative/zero values
Create a resource and modify all the attributes
t:test_case.t:steps: 1. Create a COS. 2. Create a resource. 3. Modify all the possible attributes of the resource.

t:test_case.t:objective: Modify the postalCode attribute with all possible values
Modify the zimbraCalResAutoDeclineIfBusy attribute with all possible values
Modify the street attribute with all possible values
Modify the zimbraNewNotes attribute with all possible values
Modify the zimbraCOSId attribute with all possible values.
Modify the displayName attribute with all possible values
Modify the zimbraAccountCalendarUserType attribute with all possible values
Modify the l(City) attribute with all possible values
Modify the sn(displayName) attribute with all possible values
Modify the zimbraMailHost attribute with all possible values
Modify the zimbraMailHost attribute with all possible values
Modify the zimbraCalResSite attribute with all possible values
Modify the zimbraCalResRoom attribute with all possible values
Modify the zimbraMailStatus attribute with valid values(enabled/disabled)
Modify the zimbraMailStatus attribute with all possible values
Modify the zimbraMailDeliveryAddress attribute with valid Non Existing Address and invalid address
Modify the zimbraMailDeliveryAddress attribute with all possible values
Modify the zimbraCalResFloor attribute with all possible values
Modify the zimbraAccountStatus attribute with valid values (active /maintenance /locked/ closed)
Modify the zimbraAccountStatus attribute with all possible values
Modify the zimbraCalResLocationDisplayName attribute with valid Non Existing Address and invalid address
Modify the zimbraCalResLocationDisplayName attribute with all possible values
Modify the uid attribute with all possible values
Modify the st(Newstate) attribute with all possible values
Modify the Object Class attribute with all possible values
Modify the zimbraCalResAutoAcceptDecline attribute with valid values (False/ True)
Modify the zimbraCalResAutoAcceptDecline attribute with all possible values
Modify the zimbraMailTransport attribute with all possible values
Modify the zimbraCalResBuilding attribute with all possible values
Modify the cn (Resource) attribute with all possible values
Modify the co (Country) attribute with all possible values
Verify that on modifying a resource, the user gets a notification message
t:test_case.t:steps: 1. Create a Resource with type=location. 2. Create two accounts. 3. Create an appointment with the resource created above. 4. Login as admin and modify the resource. 5. Check that the notification message should be displayed.
